title: Billboard music awards 2016: Madonna performs Prince tribute â as it happened | Culture | The Guardian
summary: from the comments ( fear and loathing edition )
winner ! - rihanna ( billboard chart achievement award )

documents.title: madonna 's prince tribute
text: prince pizzello/invision/ap madonna starts with an intro of let 's go crazy before she segues into nothing compares 2 u while sat on a purple throne ( of course ) .
she 's doing well , and the words hope and brother splash up on the big screen and a full orchestra play in the background .
pictures of prince now roll through in a slide show .
now stevie wonder is here to perform a duet of purple rain , rihanna does a dap in the front row as they rock back and forth .
it feels like the billboard awards just went to church .
madonna ends by thanking prince .
and ¦ that 's a wrap .
there were some questionable moments but the live performances from celine dion , ariana grande , britney spears , justin bieber and madonna all delivered .
perhaps understandably , it was the lower order dare i say , filler performances which really fell flat .

documents.title: `` his departure was an earthquake ''
text: prince o'meara/ap questlove from the roots is paying tribute to prince before madonna comes on .
this is really moving and his voice is cracking : everytime we hear a really good guitar solo , we 're going to remember , he says .
prince is in everything , he argues .

documents.title: winner ! adele ( top artist )
text: adele pizzello/invision/ap she 's done it again .
it 's surprising they did n't go for the weeknd considering he actually turned up .

documents.title: from the comments ( fear and loathing edition )
text: raoul duke /mca/universal/sportsphoto ltd./allstar warrocketajax 23 may 2016 2:44am come to las vegas nah , i worked there as a croupier for 3 months and i think it may have permanently injured my soul .
it 's the most horrible place on earth .

documents.title: ariana grande performs dangerous woman
text: ariana grande winter/getty images cue pink smoke , a talkbox vocal effect and ariana grande not playing a synth .
she moves away from the props and gets lined up for a dance routine .
it 's a pretty staggering difference in sound compared to our opener britney , who not so long ago was occupying a similar place to grande .
this is fairly sophisticated dance-pop with a subtle dance routine with grande 's vocals placed front and centre .
best performance of the night so far , i reckon .

documents.title: winner ! - rihanna ( billboard chart achievement award )
text: rihanna pizzello/invision/ap rihanna up this seemingly meaningless award , which has been doled out so that she does n't go home empty handed .

documents.title: ariana grande performs in 11 minutes
text: abby travis , gina schock , belinda carlisle , jane wiedlin , and charlotte caffey of music group the go-go 's becker/getty images the go-gos are getting the trainor treatment here as grande steals their thunder .
kelly rowland knows all the words as they sing the beat .

documents.title: troye sivan
text: the australian starlet is doing his thing as part of a section sponsored by a car company .
here 's a profile of the south african born star : troye sivan : i came into the music industry as an out person read more

documents.title: celine dion performs
text: celine dion performs the show must go on anzuoni/reuters she doing the show must go on and the bieber crowd do n't know what the hell is happening .
seal says it was exquisite and that there 's a surprise ¦ dion 's son is going to give her the award .
great for her , a bit boring for the rest of us .
it 's all a bit too much for dion , who looks genuinely overwhelmed .
her husband and manager renã© angã©lil died in january and she specially thanks him in an emotional acceptance speech which gets a standing ovation .
he 's here to give the icon award to celine dion , which is less exciting than him actually performing .
the voiceover for the montage section is like one of those senior cruise adverts .
end this
hang on , seal is here ¦

documents.title: rihanna performs love on the brain
text: rihanna winter/getty images she 's in a glass box , with cobwebs all over it .
the whole stage is stripped back .
there are no backing dancers or daft screens with emeralds on it , or a clock that she swings off , she 's just , you know , singing a song very well .
the performance easily gets one of the biggest reactions of the night from the crowd .
ok , rihanna is here .
let 's see if she can save things .

documents.title: winner ! - the weeknd - the hills ( top r & b song )
text: the weeknd latour/rex/shutterstock zendaya and wiz khalifa come out to give the weeknd his second gong of the night , which is n't surprising considering he had three of the five songs in the category !

documents.title: kesha covers bob dylan
text: ben folds and kesha perform kravitz/bbma2016/filmmagic after a week of will she wo n't she , kesha is here .
performing it aint me , babe with ben folds .
it 's a pretty unlikely combo and they 've created an adele-esque rendition , turning the track into a very sultry number .
it 's captivating stuff and the arena is respectfully silent as kesha slowly ratchets up the volume .
very nice indeed .
the video is pretty staid , multiple shots of adele singing and dismissively waving her hands as she sings send my love ( to your new lover ) .
not really memorable in the age of lemonade or even hotline bling .

documents.title: winner ! adele ( top billboard 200 album )
text: adele gomes/getty images kate beckinsale arrives to give the award .

adele 's video for send my love ( to your new lover ) is about to be beamed in and she accepts the award with a short video message which is chirpy and longer than all the other acceptance speeches combined

documents.title: from the comments ( vol.3 )
text: brooklynnonhipster 23 may 2016 2:11am soon there will an awards show every week and they never get boring , at all .
with a name like that it 's hard to know if this is ironic or not ¦

documents.title: dnce play cake by the ocean
text: dnce : missing more than a vowel /rex/shutterstock this is easily the worst section of the show so far .
maroon 5 impersonators dnce are here to bore everyone with their balloon-laden performance .
it was written by joe jonas and nick jonas is singing along gamely in the front row # loyal .

documents.title: gwen stefani and blake shelton perform
text: gwen stefani scarnici/wireimage the real life couple sing go ahead and break my heart , and it 's hideously schmaltzy .
i ca n't believe i 'm missing game of thrones for this .

documents.title: lukas graham performs 7 years
text: ¦ which is this generation 's hmm hmm hmm by the crash test dummies

documents.title: nick jonas and demi lovato perform
text: demi lovato winter/getty images nick jonas and demi lovato have a massive tour starting at the end of june , according to ludacris .
who also knows the details of their new singles .
jonas is performing first and is doing the whole thing through gritted teeth .
then tove lo shows up and sings at jonas through some glass .
it 's a bit steamy and actually quite interesting and they end the whole thing with a snog , or do they ¦ the lights go down just at the right time .
lovato is here to belt out cool for the summer .
there 's not much of a performance .
she walks around the stage interacting with her backing singers who look like they just want to get through the song .

documents.title: from the comments ( vol.2 )
text: foostus 23 may 2016 1:40am gross scott miller 23 may 2016 1:51am how sad !
going to need some context scott and foostus ¦

documents.title: winner ! - justin bieber ( top male artist )
text: justin bieber winter/getty images jessica alba is here to tell us that bieber has done it .
he 's not really a talker , he says .
before delivering the shortest acceptance speech of the evening and walking off .
he 's probably still tired to be fair .

documents.title: pink performs just like fire and channels wild wild west
text: pink winter/getty images pink is here , looking like annie lennox as she flies across the stadium .
this is completely ridiculous .
that was like a wwe entrance .
now she 's being carried around by a small army of helpers , i 'll call them helpers , but they do n't look like they want to be there .
this is the song from alice through the looking glass .
bieber is n't into this at all , he looks like pink just stole his hoverboard .
she flies around again , this time on a clock .
it 's like a steampunk fantasy .
brilliantly bonkers .

documents.title: dj khaled introduces justin bieber
text: justin bieber winter/getty images remember when i asked who was going to stir things up ?
well , dj khaled just did the most overblown introduction for a performance ever .
in his immutable style he left the floor open for bieber who was performing new track company in almost pitch darkness .
he emerges out of the darkness as the chorus kicks in , i believe people will call that his tro house track .
how tro house 's dreamy escapism took dance music by storm read more then he segues into sorry .
people are losing their minds in the fan section , and even the celebrities are singing along and genuinely look like they are loving this .
the stage has gone a bit wizard of oz with emeralds everywhere as bieber does the bogle .

documents.title: winner ! thomas rhett - die a happy man ( top country artist )
text: thomas rhett winter/getty images miss america and some guy off shark tank ( mark cuban ) are here to give another award .
there 's some stilted banter about mark cuban running for president .
that was painful .
thomas rhett thanks god and his lovely wife ¦ and that 's it .

documents.title: from the comments
text: nattiecsh 23 may 2016 1:34am so the usual crowd patting themselves on the back then well , meghan trainor is here so there are some outliers .

documents.title: justin bieber performs sorry in 12 minutes
text: justin bieber winter/bbma2016/getty images for dcp that 's what is flashed up on the screen just as meghan trainor starts to perform .
sorry meghan but there 's one person everyone is here to see and it aint you .

documents.title: collab time !
text: fifth harmony /rex/shutterstock our first collaboration of the night sees girl group fifth harmony and r & b crooner ty dolla $ ign link up .
fifth harmony rise up from a load of dry ice .
ty shows up and proceeds to get a very short private dance from each member of fifth harmony , some are more enthusiastic than others and then , well , he just strolls off .
easiest $ 50,000 he 's ever made !
nb - i have no idea how much he 's getting paid for this .

documents.title: 30 minute marker
text: millennium award recipient britney spears pizzello/invision/ap so ¦ we 're 30 minutes in and things have been pretty conservative so far .
britney did an abridged version of her vegas show which she performs around the corner from where the awards are being held .
the weeknd cried some crocodile tears and wiz khalifa was really really polite .
who 's going to stir it up ?

documents.title: winner ! - wiz khalifa ft charlie pugh ( top hot 100 song )
text: a winner : wiz khalifa becker/getty images ashton kutcher lets the crowd know that wiz khalifa has done it .
he 's won the top hot 100 song !
he shouts out all the other artists who were nominated and his mum .

documents.title: shawn mendes performs stitches
text: selfie stitch : shawn mendes kravitz/bbma2016/filmmagic jojo fletcher from the bachelorette is here to introduce teenthrob sensation shawn mendes .
he 's doing a sullen number while sat at a stool with an acoustic guitar .
there 's a tv in the background and now he moves to a bedroom scene where he sits at a grand piano there 's a really nice rug in that room too .
he 's performing stitches and the kids are loving it .
this man shifts units as they say in the trade .

documents.title: winner ! - the weeknd ( top hot 100 artist )
text: the weeknd /rex/shutterstock the weeknd , who is the only nominee in the building , rather predictably wins and then talks about how much prince means to him while almost crying .
he holds it together somehow - it 's only the first award !

documents.title: ludacris and ciara
text: co-hosts ludacris ( l ) and ciara becker/getty images hosts ludacris and ciara declare that britney spears was great and luda reminds everyone this is the third time he 's hosted the show before they go into a tortured gag about threesomes .
this might be a long night .
after paying homage to her legs , ludacris plugs ciara 's various projects and says he 's known her for ten years .
ciara mentions luda 's charity work without doing the obvious gag linked to his hit area codes .
britney spears kravitz/bbma2016/filmmagic slave for you sees britney and her backing dancers form a weird congo on the ground before she directs them to a stripper pole .
the director cuts to nick jonas who looks pretty non-plussed .
he 's got nothing to be smug about , i still remember his turn at the pre-grammy show ¦ things slow down with the forgettable touch of my hand , before she launches into toxic .
and ¦ that 's it .
not a bad start at all .
britney spears kravitz/bbma2016/filmmagic she starts with work bitch , which is the song she starts her vegas show ( i know this because i 've seen the thing ) .
then she segues into womanizer after ripping off a layer of clothing she 's definitely not singing live btw .
her backing singers have some light sabers and there 's a screen that looks a bit like something from tron .
it 's not exactly mind blowing but if you want a competent run through of an artist 's biggest numbers , while she mimes and plays really bad air guitar , this is the one for you !

documents.title: we 're off ¦ britney is here
text: britney spears at the billboard music awards haraway/afp/getty images we 've just had a breathless introduction to the evening with an extensive list of artists who all seem to be making comebacks .
first up , britney .
although , she never really went away .

documents.title: welcome to the billboard music awards liveblog
text: ariana grande attends the 2016 billboard music awards becker/getty images hello everyone , i 'm sat in a room in new york following all the action from the billboard music awards in las vegas .
it should be an interesting evening with kesha 's first performance in years ( and since her legal disputes with dr luke ) and madonna ( and friends ) are performing a tribute to prince .
we 're moments away now so prepare thyself .

Ariana Grande performs Dangerous Woman

From the comments (Fear and Loathing edition)

3.36am BST
03:36
WINNER! - Rihanna (Billboard Chart Achievement Award)

bulletin.text: Madonna and Stevie Wonder paid homage to Prince, while the Weeknd took home a clutch of awards and Ariana Grande impressed on stage.
See the full list of winners.
